{x  The massive wall of Heifong stretches north and south, a large gate
opens up, revealing a busy city inside.  On either side of the gate glows

few guards stand on top of the wall, watching over the moving traffic, and
one guard stands next to the gate entrance checking people out.  A sign above
reads off [ Heifong III ].  Also next to the gate is a plaque.

apartments look like".  There is an oversized bed with triple layer
sheets, a jade and elftimber desk, two gold makou lamps, and a

steel door is totally a coincidence too.

are obviously not the best apartments to call home.  They are the
cliche of run-down apartments, even the road sign has burnt out bulbs!
But none the less, this apartment is the home of Mikal Doniv, one of
the many airship mechanics in this part of town.  It is a small little
apartment, just a bedroom, the bathroom, and the living room, which
doubles as a kitchen.  Not the greatest piece of property, but it's
what this burly human calls home.
54305.name: {GVali nt{R R ads{x

description: A sign says-
"Hello! Welcome to the First Anon ATM! To activate the machine, you
must press one of three buttons-
1.To withdraw cash, type WITHDRAW <amount>, and your account will be
automatically debited while the money is transferred to you.
2.To deposit cash, type DEPOSIT <amount>, and your account will be
automatically credited.
3.To simply check your balance, type BALANCE.
Thank You and have a GOOD day, citizen! :)"
There is an ATM in the wall directly opposite the stairs as you ascend.
You see that there is a long queue and curse loudly. A few heads turn to
stare at you but most people who come here are used to such outbursts.
Eventually its your turn. If you don't know what to do, read the instructions
by looking at the ATM, and thus incur the wrath of the impatient patrons
behind you :)
54263.name: The ATM

Located adjacent to the {RJ{*u{ws{Wt{wi{*c{Re S{*t{wre{*e{Rt G{*y{Rm{x, the proprietor of this
establishment is trying to maximize his sales by providing users with

Bottles, jars and a glass case full of small vials are heavily stocked
and on full display.  A hulking minotaur sits in a chair, and next to
him is a bagful of money, as only cash transactions are accepted.  {x

description: Wreckball is played in a plasteel pit lined with razor blades about half the
size of your regular football field and about ten meters deep. Players are
lowered in via hoversleds by the armored RefBots, and then play commences
thirty seconds after the indestructible titanium ball is dropped in. The
match lasts exactly one hour- no time-outs, no intervals, no breaks, no
half-time entertainment. Just one hour of pure, unbridled bloodshed and
carnage. You force yourself to stop drooling and enjoy the game.

description: {cJustice Street Main is North Heifong III's center of trade.
Adventurers from all walks of life converge here for their
regular deals on rare and unusual commodities. Today is no
exception, as the street is bustling with activity. A sign
is here:

Corner of Justice Street and Stalwart Lane
Servicing the quaffing needs of travelers from around the world,
the potion shop provides everything from the simplest love potion, to
powerful healing potions - for a price.  Potions bubble and boil
inside glass display cases, their prices clearly marked on each case.

Bar
To the east stands the large gates of Heifong, an arch stone
structure standing about 50 feet high, topped with guards with
crossbows, watching the incoming and outgoing traffic between the
city, and the Port itself.  A flow of people and airships move about
this area, it is the only entrance into the eastern part of Heifong,
the city better known as Heifong III.  To the west Heifong Drive
stretches out, a large street capable of holding several airships
passing at once.  Welcome to Heifong.

description: The Victory Parade East Gate
Victory Parade East
{DThis place is huge!  The ceiling goes up as far as the eye can see.
In the middle of the huge club is a stage...  20 feet off the ground!
To the sides are two huge steam engines which are hooked up to a
pulley system to lift the stage up.  Slowly they trickle steam onto
and across the floor.  The DJ is on the stage mixing his music in a
liquid symphony of sound.  Welcome to {DS{7p{Wa{7c{De {Bat {YHeifong{D.  {x

This small desolated part of Heifong doesn't seem to have any common
good and is used mostly by pirates and other scum.

Courier building located on the south end of the airship port.  To the

To the east in the far distance is the Makou Gate

description: The convention center stretches out from the doorway to reveal row
after row of theater seats.  At the far end of the room the floor
raises to become an amphitheater stage.  The room has a tall ceiling,
decorated in bright painted colors and a mural of life in the Heifong
Region.  The outter walls of the theater stand in pillar form, holding
up the giant ceiling.  A makou gas light beautifully decorated is
perched on each pillar, a small switch on the bottom allowing someone
to adjust how much light it will give off.  The room gives the type of
sound that if you were to yell, it would echo.  And even so, the room
has a dull echo from the activities on the street above.

actually think someone's living in this small apartment.  There is a
bucket of dirty dishes and a pile of soiled clothes which also
indicate that this person isn't a very neat individual.  Aside from a
bed, chairs, table, and a small wardrobe, this room is pretty plain.

Valiant Street

nice fancy name for "pay your taxes here".  Several desks are lined up

This warehouse hasn't been used in a long time.  A few bums are
